title: Replace eagle logo with high-detail futuristic robotic eagle head and premium animations

requirements.summary: Generate a high-detail futuristic robotic eagle head image with metallic robotic structure, AI machine-style face panels, mechanical feather segments, sharp aggressive beak design, glowing neon cyan energy lines, subtle circuit patterns or tech engravings, futuristic armor plating look, symmetrical professional design, and premium startup branding quality
acceptanceCriteria: Logo displays metallic robotic structure with mechanical feather segments
Includes glowing neon cyan energy lines matching website theme
Features subtle circuit patterns or tech engravings
Has sharp aggressive beak design with futuristic armor plating
Design is symmetrical and professional
Avoids cartoon style, flat vector, clipart appearance, and over-complex noisy details

file_operations.description: Update the eagle logo image source to use the newly generated robotic eagle head image at frontend/public/assets/generated/robotic-eagle-logo.dim_512x512.png, ensuring the image integrates with existing neon glow effects and maintains strong visibility on dark background

requirements.summary: Replace the current eagle logo image in EagleLogo.tsx component with the newly generated futuristic robotic eagle head
acceptanceCriteria: New robotic eagle logo replaces current eagle in EagleLogo component
Logo maintains compatibility with existing neon glow effects
Logo remains sharp and visible on dark background
Logo blends naturally with header/navbar styling

file_operations.description: Replace the current eagle logo image reference with frontend/public/assets/generated/robotic-eagle-logo.dim_512x512.png while preserving all existing neon glow effects, hover animations, and dark background compatibility in the component structure

requirements.summary: Add a cinematic robotic activation animation sequence (2-4 seconds) to the eagle logo with staged reveal effects including gradual appearance, neon line activation, AI boot sequence eyes, energy scan, and final glow pulse
acceptanceCriteria: Animation sequence runs for 2-4 seconds with smooth cinematic easing
Eagle head appears gradually from dark background
Neon cyan lines activate progressively across the logo
Eyes glow with an AI boot-up sequence effect
Soft energy scan animation passes across the logo surface
Animation concludes with a subtle glow pulse
No sudden pop-in or jarring transitions

file_operations.description: Implement a cinematic robotic activation animation with the following stages: (1) eagle head fade-in from dark background over 0.5s, (2) progressive neon cyan line activation across the logo over 1s, (3) AI boot sequence eye glow effect over 0.5s, (4) soft energy scan sweep across logo surface over 0.8s, (5) final subtle glow pulse over 0.4s; use smooth cubic-bezier easing for professional tech-brand feel and avoid sudden pop-in effects

Add CSS keyframe animations for the robotic activation sequence including fade-in, neon-line-activate, eye-glow-boot, energy-scan-sweep, and glow-pulse animations with cinematic easing functions to support the eagle logo activation effect

requirements.summary: Implement hover interaction animation on the eagle logo that increases glow intensity slightly and adds a very small floating motion
acceptanceCriteria: Glow intensity increases subtly on hover
Logo displays gentle floating motion on hover
Animation maintains professional appearance without being excessive
Hover effects work smoothly across desktop browsers

file_operations.description: Add hover state interaction that increases the existing neon glow intensity by 20-30% and applies a subtle vertical floating motion (translateY oscillation of 2-4px) using smooth transitions to maintain clean professional appearance
Add CSS keyframe animation for gentle floating motion (subtle translateY oscillation) and enhanced glow intensity classes to support the eagle logo hover interaction effects

requirements.summary: Optimize eagle logo animations for mobile devices by automatically reducing animation weight while maintaining logo sharpness and centered positioning across all device sizes
acceptanceCriteria: Logo animations run smoothly on mobile devices without performance issues
Animation complexity is automatically reduced on smaller screens
Logo remains sharp and high-quality across all device sizes
Logo maintains centered positioning on mobile, tablet, and desktop views

file_operations.description: Implement responsive animation optimization using CSS media queries and prefers-reduced-motion to automatically reduce animation complexity on mobile devices (simplify or disable energy scan and floating effects below 768px breakpoint) while maintaining sharp image rendering and centered positioning across all viewport sizes

Add media query rules for mobile devices (max-width: 768px) and prefers-reduced-motion to reduce animation duration, disable complex effects, and ensure the robotic eagle logo remains performant and centered on smaller screens
